thread.title: EVRY chosen by Vellinge Municipality for overall solution and IT as service
thread.title_full: BRIEF-EVRY chosen by Vellinge Municipality for overall solution and IT as service | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: EVRY chosen by Vellinge Municipality for overall solution and IT as service
text:
Sept 25 Evry ASA :
* Says Vellinge Municipality chooses EVRY for overall solution and IT as service
* Initially order value is estimated to about 140 million Swedish crowns ($16.6 million)
* Says agreement is for 5 years with possible extension of up to 5 years Source text for Eikon:
 ($1 = 8.4219 Swedish crowns) (Gdynia Newsroom)
